# Caveduke - Handcrafted Luxury Wine Cabinets since 1985

Premium custom wine cabinets manufactured in Spain (Barcelona). Specializing in noble woods, steel, and glass.

## Key Technical Specs
- **Origin:** Spain (Barcelona)
- **Materials:** Solid walnut, cherry, oak, professional-grade steel
- **Capacity:** From private homes to commercial cellar systems
- **Customization:** Full bespoke design available

## Languages
- ES: https://avinotecas.com/
- EN: https://avinotecas.com/en
- FR: https://avinotecas.com/fr

## Site Overview
This landing page showcases the heritage, philosophy, and collections of Caveduke wine cabinets.
